settings.title: with the Ultimate Cellular Cleanse

settings.html:
Today, more than ever, people are looking to clear their body of the toxins they’re being exposed to on a daily basis.

Enter the cleanse - a popular process designed to rid the body of unhealthy substances that can negatively impact health. Cleanses are popular, but there is no scientific proof that they work to remove the toxins from our body.

settings.description: The popular juice and water cleanses, while promising to remove toxins, through “flushing” the gastrointestinal system, are not scientifically or medically proven to work. In addition, they come with health risks,including the potential for vitamin and mineral deficiencies. They can also be dangerous for diabetics, and juice fasts in particular can seriously harm those with kidney problems.

settings.html: What if you could experience a cleanse at the cellular level

settings.description:
A cleaning of the cell that has been scientifically proven, and results in cellular rejuvenation and longevity.

What if this cellular cleanse also didn’t require you to endure a multi-day, liquid- only diet? And what if there was a program with real food that let you eat and still get the benefit of a cellular cleanse?

settings.html: Unlock the secret to fasting with food and the cellular cleansing effects that come with it!

settings.tag: If you're ready for the ultimate, cellular cleanse for a total reset, then ProLon’s® Fasting Mimicking Diet® (FMD®) can definitely help.
settings.title: to Trigger a Process that Cleanses the Body at a Cellular Level.

settings.html:
